reviews.text: The boat is very smooth and great for people with back problems. I am personally not a very good swimmer so Ben was very helpful in me get back on the boat after snorkeling. …More
reviews.author: Customer

reviews.text: Thundercat - Red Cat Adventures (owner)a week agoThank you so much for your wonderful and detailed feedback! 😊 We’re delighted to hear that the smooth ride and Ben’s helpfulness made your snorkeling experience comfortable and enjoyable, especially given your swimming concerns 🐠. Jade will be so happy to know her bubbly energy and tour guidance added to your trip’s fun! 🌟We agree—Whitehaven Beach truly is spectacular, and it’s great that you enjoyed the multiple snorkeling spots and the inlet views 🐟. Thanks also for your honest thoughts about the food—we appreciate your understanding about the packaged deal and the option to bring your own drinks 🍴.Your recommendation means a lot to us, and we hope to welcome you back for another amazing Whitsundays adventure soon! ❤️
reviews.author: Customer

reviews.text: Amazing day and a must do!! Chocolate brownies, a fabulous lunch and fruit skewers on the way back were all great! The snorkeling was awesome, saw some amazing fish and seascapes! Captain Ben and decky Jade were so good, professional, …More

reviews.text: Thundercat - Red Cat Adventures (owner)a week agoThank you so much for your amazing feedback! 😊 We’re thrilled you enjoyed the snorkeling, delicious treats, and fabulous lunch 🍫🍽️🐠. reviews.text: We just had the best day out with Jarrod & Frankie! What an experience snorkelling with the fishes 🐟 by the reef... we had lunch on the boat & even saw some turtles 🐢 & whales 🐋 😱 our family absolutely loved it & the boys made the adventure …More

How awesome 🙌. We’ll be sure to pass on your kind words to the boys, they’ll be stoked to hear it. Can’t wait to welcome you and the family back for another adventure soon! 🏝️🤿
